product_name: LancomeArtliner Precision Felt Tip Liquid Eyeliner
summary: SummaryLancôme Artliner Precision Felt-Tip Liquid Eyeliner creates long lasting clean lines with precise application. Comes in satin & metallic finishes.
details: DetailsFeaturesLancôme Artliner Precision Felt-Tip Liquid Eyeliner is ideal for creating bold eye makeup looks from dramatic cat eyes to winged eyeliner. This easy-to-apply and richly pigmented liquid eyeliner gives intense color payoff and ultimate staying power.BenefitsA smudge-proof eyeliner with unique, double film-forming set of polymers for vibrant colorFrom dramatic eye makeup to smokey eye makeup, the felt-tipped pen allows for ultimate precision, making it one of the best liquid eyeliners for eyeliner wings, a cat eye, or to use as a tightline eyelinerCreate flawless eye definition with long-lasting lines and intense color payoffFormulated WithoutSulfates SLS & SLESMineral OilPhthalatesFormaldehydesParabensItem 2301337How To UseCan be used on bare eyelids, or over any eyeshadow makeup look.Apply as close to lashes as possible for a tightline.Use your eyelashes as a guide, pressing the side of the felt-tipped applicator onto skin.Use the tip of the applicator to fill in any gaps between lashes.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Can be used on bare eyelids, or over any eyeshadow makeup look.Apply as close to lashes as possible for a tightline.Use your eyelashes as a guide, pressing the side of the felt-tipped applicator onto skin.Use the tip of the applicator to fill in any gaps between lashes.

reviews.headline: Lancôme never disappoints!
reviews.comments: I purchased the brown color and it's nice and pigmented. This eyeliner is waterproof, fast drying and it doesn't irritate me around my sensitive eyes. It is a long wear eyeliner and not a problem to remove with makeup remover.  I love it!

reviews.headline: I would buy and have bought it over and over!
reviews.comments: It is one of the best eyeliners! I buy others but keep coming back to Lancôme products!

reviews.headline: Poor Formula - Not worth what it costs
reviews.comments: I love Lancome products but I have to downvote this product unfortunately. The pigment isn't very dark and wouldn't fully saturate the applicator tip no matter how I shook it. Through out the day, I noticed that the eyeliner had "cracked" on my lower lash line and black flakes were on my cheeks. I'm disappointed in this one.

reviews.headline: Beautiful
reviews.comments: I was recommended this eye liner because I had a bad experience with Urban Decay. This products application is on point. It goes on smoothly and is so easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Lancôme Artliner
reviews.comments: Do not purchase smears after an hour and not worth the cost. Tried three colors and had the same result.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments:
This is the BEST eyeliner ive ever used! I was a die hard Stila girl for a ling time, I branched out + tried a few other brands as well. 

I think what makes this so great is that the ink flows smoothly + evenly, creating a flawless line. I suspect they add more ink, and higher quality ink than other liners. Using traditional liquid eyeliners from other brands, I find its patchy with the liquid unevenly dispersing. So i have to go over it again in certain spots. 

Keep in mind I only use brown eyeliners. So I believe its easier to notice consistency vs inconsistency in browns which are not as opaque as black. 

I purchased the shade in metallic brown and honedtly, its perfect! It's a great everyday shade in a warm yummy brown, and you can only tell its metallic close up! 

I highly recommend this product and think all the brands should know this is the move!!!

reviews.headline: Dries out so quickly after a couple of uses
reviews.comments: I don't understand how this eyeliner is set on this price point…I only got it during a sale and wanted to try something different. It dried so quick after a second use. Even a drugstore product would last so much longer. You are basically paying for the brand not the quality of the product

reviews.headline: Old and faithful
reviews.comments: I had been using this eyeliner for a decade and then just swapped it for Stila for a change . I decided to come back to it and am so glad I did .  It gives a precise application and stays put all day .

reviews.headline: Favorite Eyeliner!
reviews.comments: Lancome Artliner has been my go-to eyeliner for years! It is so easy to apply and lasts all day. I love it!

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: It seemed like the eyeliner was dried out so was unable to use for more than a couple times.  For how expensive it was,  I would have thought the quality would've been better. I did order this online.

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: I had the same experience as many of the people giving negative reviews. After 5 or 6 applications, it looks like I ran out of product. No waterproof.  Not long lasting effect except when it sits under the eyes. You'll have wonderful raccoon eyes!!!

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments: Have great results and compliments.

reviews.headline: good but needs work
reviews.comments: the color is good, but you have to put the applicator back in and shake it so many times while applying, I don't wear a whole bunch of eyeliner so I'm unsure why I have to keep putting the applicator back in and shake it while applying. the brush is also really thick so making mistakes is super easy and then super time consuming to fix because then you have to constantly put it back in and shake it to get more product and then attempt to fix the eyeliner. what used to take me maybe 3 minutes to do now takes me close to 10 minutes

reviews.headline: Perfect line
reviews.comments: I love this eye liner. The tip allows you to make the line as thin or thick as you want. I love the brown color. It's dark without being harsh looking.

reviews.headline: I just bought this and I hate it..It "streaks" when applying
reviews.comments: This product streaks when applying...

reviews.headline: The BAD Lancome eyeliner
reviews.comments: I bought this one, thinking it was the full sized eyeliner I'd gotten a sample of and loved.  That one is the Idole eyliner, and it's FABULOUS. This one is horrible! While it lasts a long time, there is no point in the applicator, which makes it incredibly difficult to use.   Buy the other one!

reviews.headline: Not that great
reviews.comments: Wanted to love this liner but returned it.  For rhe price it should be more pigmented and not skip.  There are much cheaper liners out there that are much better

reviews.headline: Need to get rid of it!
reviews.comments: This is the worst eyeliner I have ever purchased. Once it dries, and after only a couple hours of wear, it tends to crack, and then flick off the eye and all over the surrounding area, including in the eye. I'm very disappointed in this Lancome product.

reviews.headline: So disappointed.
reviews.comments:
I read the reviews and purchased the eyeliner thinking it was going to be amazing. I was shocked when I opened it for the first time to apply it and there was hardly any product on a tiny, uneven looking brush. The first swipe of the eyeliner onto my eyelid didn't even make it halfway across before I needed to get more eyeliner on the brush, and the line that WAS produced was watery and uneven. I dipped the brush back into the eyeliner and had to screw it back on and shake it repeatedly to get a tiny modicum of color on the brush! I had to do that 5-6 times just to get both eyes lined and the end result was just depressing. I've never encountered  a liner that smudges this easily. I've been doing my eyeliner for 30 years, and I've never taken the time to write a negative review, so that should tell you something. 
Buyer beware.

reviews.headline: Smells moldy and comes out watery
reviews.comments:
I just bought this from the sale since I have been using lancome mascaras since 2015 and always love them.  
I tried it.  I shook the bottle like you're supposed to and when I was applying it.  Some of it comes out black and then it gets weird and watery.  Once the product dried, it started flashing off in patches.  
I smelled it since it was acting off, and it smells like mildew and moldy. 
This has to be a bad or expired product.  I want to return it but Ulta said I couldn't without its original packaging.  I threw it out because I have never had any issues with lancome before.  I really want to return this since it obviously has something wrong with it.  Even the girl at ulta agreed it smelled weird but she wouldn't help me.

media.headline: If you love liquid liner you will love this!
media.caption: Liner on point

media.headline: AMAZING
media.caption: Can do different eyeliner effects, wing/cat-eye, normal, etc..

faceoff_positive.comments: I have purchased and tried several eye liners (pencil, gel, etc) from multiple brands and I did not like any of them because they did not last more than a few hours. I have a little oily skin, so even when I put the eyelid primer, these eye liners got smudged. Also, these were not easy to apply. However, ARTLINER from LANCOME is an absolute winner!! I finally found the one that really works!! I've been using it for over a week now. * It stays on for the whole 9 hrs while I left home, went to work, and came home!! * It does not smudge. * Color stays the same as well -- it does not fade away. * It dries faster than I expected, so it's nice especially when I don't have much time in the morning before I go to work. * Also, it is easier to apply than I thought. A little tip for you -- When the color gets lighter, just put the pen back into the tube, shake a little (which makes some clicking sound), and the liquid is on again. I hesitated for a month or so to purchase this eye liner because this isn't cheap for me, but...I highly recommend this eye liner! Totally worth it :-) This was my 1st Lancome purchase.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it! I'm glad I purchased this liner!

faceoff_negative.comments: Hi! I'm wondering what color I can use to replace the ice black. Are used ice black for 18 years along with my three sisters and two great friends.   We all LOVE Ice Black and wonder why you don't offer it anymore? Will you be offering it at all in the future? It is a perfect color for women who are over 50. It is a soft collar and it is in Hance into the eyes.    And wonder why you don't offer it anymore? Will you be offering it at all in the future? It is a perfect color for women who are over 50. It is a soft collar and it is in Hance into the eyes.  Please let me know if you'll be offering this excellent color again in the future.
